commitResults.messageBody:
Create Anoop.java main class
Create Command enum with text block messages
Update .gitignore to ignore .class files

Add Parser class to parse user input into Command object
Moved output text from Command to CommandHandler
Add CommandHandler to handle Command object

Add List and Task commands to Command class.
Add TaskStorage class and StorageFullException.
Made CommandHandler and Parser constructors to be private.
These changes are to enforce information hiding.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add mark and unmark task functionalities
commitResults.messageBody:
Add Task class to further enforce OOP
Changed TaskStorage to use ArrayList instead of array,
because Java arrays are covariant and unsafe
Add new exception for TaskStorage

Add Todo, Deadline, and Event task types
Add TaskFactory class to instantiate tasks
Add new InvalidTaskFormatException when user input for tasks is invalid
Improved documentation for certain classes
Bugfix in markTaskAsNotDone causing wrong exception to be thrown

Add I/O techniques to semi-automate chatbot testing
Add Command.UNKNOWN command type

Add exception error handling for incorrect inputs by the user (this was already implemented in previous commits but
committing again to explicitly show Level-5 is done)

Add method to TaskStorage to delete task
Add Command.DELETE to Command
Update Parser and CommandHandler
Add documentation to InvalidTaskFormatException

commitResults.messageTitle: Add save and load tasks to disk
commitResults.messageBody:
Change TaskStorage to TaskList
Change TaskList and CommandHandler to non-static classes
Add Storage class for save/load tasks
Add new factory method to TaskFactory
for string representation of Task
Add save/load functionalities

Change date data type from String to
LocalDateTime
Update TaskFactory to parse new format
Add data.txt to .gitignore
Update documentation

Change date of Deadline and Event from String to LocalDateTime
Update TaskFactory to parse new format

Add Ui class to handle user inputs. Storage, Parser, TaskList already existed beforehand.
Fix bugs in TaskFactory where wrong date format was parsed
and wrong exception was thrown.

Add new Ui class. Storage, TaskList, and Parser already existed.
Fix bugs in TaskFactory where wrong date format was parsed and
wrong exception was being thrown.
Create command, task, and exception packages
Organise files into packages exception, command, and task.
